description: This table contains the selected case's quality assurance information.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_CASE_QA_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This will store the QA (Quality Assurance) event type for the case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAB_CASE_QA_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the correlated case record.

columns.name: LAB_CASE_QA_SPEC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the correlated specimen record.

columns.name: LAB_AP_REVIEWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who is the reviewer of a related QA (Quality Assurance) event.

columns.name: LAB_AP_REVIEW_DATE
columns.description: Stores the review date of a related QA (Quality Assurance) event.

columns.name: LAB_AP_QA_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number for the related QA (Quality Assurance) event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Completed

columns.name: LAB_CASE_QA_ORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the correlated order record.
